register.title: User Registration
register.toastTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

home.guestDesc: Please log in or register to get started
home.personalStatsDesc: Here is your exam performance overview

quick.importDesc: Upload a file of questions to quickly add to your bank
quick.myQuestionsDesc: View and manage all your questions
quick.startExamDesc: Take a mock exam to test your knowledge

adminCard.title: Admin Tools
adminCard.desc: As an admin, you can view statistics for all users

questions.title: My Question Bank
questions.subtitle: Manage and preview all your questions
questions.noQuestionsDesc: Click "Import Questions" above to add questions to your bank
questions.confirmDeleteOne: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
questions.confirmDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete all questions? This cannot be undone.

import.title: Import Question Bank
import.subtitle: Upload a file of questions and we will parse and add them to your bank

tips.saved: Questions are saved automatically, refreshing will not lose data
tips.startExam: Click "Start Exam" to begin a mock test
tips.importMore: You can import more questions at any time

toast.empty: No valid questions found. Please check the file format
toast.saveFail: Failed to save questions, please try again

fileImporter.dropOrClick: Drop a file here or click to upload
fileImporter.support: Supports .csv files. Headers must include Question / Question Text / Options / Correct Answer / Explanation (Question Type / Sub Questions optional)

req.csv: File must be in CSV format
req.headers: Headers include Question / Question Text / Options / Correct Answer / Explanation (Question Type / Sub Questions optional)
req.optionsJson: Options must be JSON, e.g. {"A":"Option A","B":"Option B"}
req.correctAnswer: Correct Answer supports single/multiple/order/matching. For order: "A -> B -> C"
req.subQuestions: Matching uses Sub Questions (JSON array or | separated)

toast.invalidHeader: CSV headers do not meet requirements
toast.parseError: An error occurred while parsing the file
toast.noValid: No valid questions found. Please check the file format

createQuestion.title: Create Question
createQuestion.subtitle: Create a new question and add it to your bank
createQuestion.correctHintMatching: Select the best option for each description

tips.saved: Questions are saved automatically to your bank
tips.multiOptions: You can set multiple, ordered, or matching questions based on the type
tips.explanation: Explanations help review after the exam

toast.needOption: At least one option is required
toast.needRequirement: At least one description is required
toast.missingOption: Please enter at least one option
toast.missingOrder: Order questions need at least two options
toast.missingMatching: Please match each description to an option
toast.matchingOptionLimit: Matching descriptions cannot exceed available options
toast.correctEmpty: Correct answers must reference non-empty options
toast.saveFail: Failed to save question, please try again

exam.noQuestions: No available questions. Please import questions first
exam.preStartTitle: Ready to start the mock exam
exam.preStartDesc: This exam has {{count}} questions and lasts {{duration}} minutes

rules.title: Exam Rules:
rules.timing: The timer starts when the exam begins and auto-submits when time is up
rules.autoSave: You can switch questions anytime and your answers are saved automatically
rules.showResults: After submission, your score and explanations will be shown
rules.multiChoice: Some questions are multiple choice; select all correct answers
rules.orderChoice: Some questions require ordering; select in the correct sequence
rules.matchingChoice: Some questions are matching; select the best option for each description

exam.multiChoiceHint: Multiple choice: select all correct answers
exam.orderChoiceHint: Order question: select options in sequence
exam.matchingChoiceHint: Matching question: select the best option for each description (each option at most once)
exam.matchingMissing: This matching question is missing descriptions
exam.saveResultFail: Failed to save exam results, please try again
exam.saveAnswersFail: Failed to save answers, please try again
exam.timeUp: Time is up. The exam has been submitted automatically.
exam.title: Mock Exam
exam.subtitle: Answer the following questions to complete the exam
exam.confirmSubmit: Are you sure you want to submit? Your score will be calculated.

results.title: Exam Results
results.subtitle: View your score and detailed explanations
results.perfectTitle: Great job! You got everything correct
results.noResultDesc: Please complete a mock exam first

questionCard.matchingMissing: This matching question is missing descriptions
